lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton targeted Bernie Sanders’s electoral appeal with some of her strongest language yet in a debate on Sunday night, trying to undercut his image as an anti-political truth teller.

byline.contributor: Patrick Healy reported from New York, and Amy Chozick from Charleston, S.C.
byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and AMY CHOZICK

headline.print_headline: Clinton Seizes on Policy Shifts in 4th Debate
headline.main: In Democratic Debate, Hillary Clinton Challenges Bernie Sanders on Policy Shifts

snippet: Hillary Clinton targeted Bernie Sanders’s electoral appeal with some of her strongest language yet in a debate on Sunday night, trying to undercut his image as an anti-political truth teller.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, in fourth Democratic presidential debate, attacks Bernie Sanders over his policy shifts on health care and gun control and seeks to portray him as fringe candidate at odds with Pres Obama's accomplishments; Sanders appears exasperated at times as Clinton attempts to undermine his consistency on policy issues, one of his strong suits with voters.
